## About It

-   [ChariotSanzzo](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1070103829934260344&permissions=8&integration_type=0&scope=bot+applications.commands) was made to be a Discord Bot, for general use and a companion for playing RPG as well.
-   [Gjallarhorn](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1273070668451418122&permissions=3149056&integration_type=0&scope=bot) as well is another Discord bot, made to be used together with Chariot, for extra SFX functions.
-   They were both made with C#, with [DSharpPlus](https://github.com/DSharpPlus/DSharpPlus) and run in .NET as console apps.
-   For it's functions in a more expecific way, ChariotSanzzo goes from general commands as cleaning chats, to more interesting things, such as rolling dices for RPG, playing Music and SFX from `Youtube`, `Sounclound`, and `Spotify`.
-   It contains functions for the [`Albina RPG`](https://www.notion.so/albinarpg/SISTEMA-ALBINA-080f1dcc12624a07ba4f83296d4119f5), the [SetsuTeaParty](https://github.com/SetsuTeaParty)'s original RPG System, as well.
-   Lastly, I made a [Browser Controle Panel](https://github.com/IttoSanzzo/GjallarhornControl), that can be used with the bot too.

## How to use it

<p align="center"><img alt="Hello World" src="https://i.imgur.com/IzKYKV4.png"></p>

-   ChariotSanzzo can be added to any Server you're in, and have invite permission using this invite: [`Invite ChariotSanzzo`](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1070103829934260344&permissions=8&integration_type=0&scope=bot+applications.commands)
-   The same goes for Gjallarhorn as well (Keep in mind that you need ChariotSanzzo, to use Gjallarhorn): [`Invite Gjallarhorn`](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1273070668451418122&permissions=3149056&integration_type=0&scope=bot)
-   Make sure to give them all the permissions they may need (or... administrator, it's easier).
-   Once it's done, all chariot and Gjallarhorn commands work under the common "Discord Slash Commands" mechanic. Just type `/` while the writing bar is empty, and it will expand with the available commands.
-   Alternatively, typing `@` and marking chariot will work as well.
-   Have Fun.

## Dice Commands

<p align="center"><img alt="Dice Simple Example" src="https://i.imgur.com/zGSkCCI.png"></p>

-   ChariotSanzzo is able to run dices in 2 ways: either using the `Slash Commands`, to do so, under the `Dice` command group, or simply... typing the dice.
-   Yeah, right like that, typing d20 for example, and sending it, will run the dice command, and retrive one 20 sides dice thrown.
-   She will always replay, as long as you request with a valid dice.
-   A valid dice will always contains only numbers, spaces, a `d`, or `D`, and the other dice tokes.
-   `D or d`: The number that comes later it is the number of sides the dice has, and is obligatory, while the number that comes before it , is the number of dices thrown in each try. For example, `2d30` translates to 2 dices of 30 sides.
-   `#`: It can come before the number, before the `D`, or right before it, and the number that comes before the `#` will be how many tries to roll. For example, `3#d20` will translate to 3 tries of one dice of 20 sides.
-   `A or a`: Works as advantage or disadvantage. It can come right after the number os sides, and using `A`, followed by a number, will make that number of dices from the try, to be removed from the roll, from the minnor one up. Using `a` on the other hand, will do the same, but removing the greater ones down.

<p align="center"><img width=275px alt="Dice Simple Example 2" src="https://i.imgur.com/CKLFMwg.png"></p>

-   `+ - * /`: Lastly, using this mathematical signs in the end of the message, will automatically calculate the result from the given equation, using the dice result in each roll try.

<p align="center"><img width=275px alt="Dice Simple Example 2" src="https://i.imgur.com/JzvcJku.png"></p>

-   It will work in anywhere the bot can read and send messages, and can be deactivated by any administrator with the `ServerSettings` commands.

## Music Component

-   I put a LOT of work and effort into this bit of the bots, so Chariot is pretty capable of any Discord Music Bot think you can probably think of.
-   `/music play` can search a music in youtube or souncloud, by a query, or play directly from any link you pass it from Youtube, Soundcloud, or even Spotify, and playlists are no exception.
-   From that point on, there are lots and lots of music commands to use, for pausing and resuming, skipping and going back in tracks, viweing the current queue, cleaning it, shuffling it, looping it for the track, or queue, skipping to expecific tracks in the queue, and more.

<p align="center"><img alt="Music Queue" src="https://i.imgur.com/agoQANT.png"></p>

-   Also, it as a embebed Music Player, which shows informations about the currently playing track, and convenient contextual adaptative buttons to use other commands, right from the player.

<p align="center"><img alt="Music Player" src="https://i.imgur.com/jyFn6Ey.png"></p>

-   If you want to, can as well control it using the [Browser Controle Panel](https://github.com/IttoSanzzo/GjallarhornControl) I made, which link can be obtained using the `/music controlpanel` or `/sfx controlpanel` for the ChariotSanzzo or Gjallarhorn controls, respectively.

## Server Settings

-   Administrators can tweak some of the Chariot functions using the `ServerSettings` commands:
